name: Swag Zero Gravity Daddy Plus
description:
Swag Zero Gravity Daddy Plus 

Submission for libGDX Jam 18. Hail the zebra.

Controls PC

Move: A/D or Left/Right arrow keys
Reset: R

Mobile

Move: Press the left half of the screen to go left, and right for right
Reset: Hold both halves for a second

Are you stuck?

We get it. Sometimes a level can stump you. As a last resort, here's some help:
